config: Reviews are the word-of-mouth advertising of the digital age. 79% of consumers report trusting online reviews as much as they trust personal recommendations from a friend or family member. This means that reviews are important! Luckily, Justia allows both peer reviews from other attorneys and reviews from your clients in our directory.

config.description: Requesting client reviews is one of the best ways to showcase your professional services for future clients.  Don’t worry – we only permit reviews from actual clients.
